polygon.style: fill: rgb(0, 190, 221); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
fill: rgb(0, 120, 182); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
fill: rgb(30, 80, 176); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
fill: rgb(127, 61, 148); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
fill: rgb(75, 56, 133); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
fill: rgb(5, 10, 95); transform: translate(0px) scaleX(1); transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
